body:
Reported by project member melvinzhang, Feb 1, 2011
The AI in Magarena takes quite a long time to plan its move when there are a lot of creatures on the board. This is understandable, however, the user has no way of knowing when it will finish.

A suggestion for future enhancement is to provide a configurable time limit and a progress bar (or countdown timer) so that the user knows how long more he/she has to wait. When the time is up, the AI should play the best move it can find within the given time limit.

Comment 1 by project member ubeefx, Feb 1, 2011
Count down timer is maybe not that straight forward.
But stopping thinking of AI should be doable.

Also maybe improving the algorithm :
- limit search depth even more in such cases
- handle large number of creatures in better way

This only applies to level 6 or below.
Anything above that is not guaranteed to be fast.
Initially this was also the maximum level.
